# Driver

# Driver

Represents a driver that can play a score. Uses Tone.Transport, which is a member of the class. Best practice is to create one driver that will be used to play everything.

Kind: global class

  • Driver
    • .bpm
    • .bpm ⇒ number
    • .loopStart
    • .state ⇒ String
    • .position ⇒ Ticks
    • .setScore(score, [updateTransport]) ⇒ this
    • .setInstruments(Instruments) ⇒ this
    • .addInstrument(instrument)
    • .startMetronome() ⇒ this
    • .stopMetronome() ⇒ this
    • .toggleMetronome() ⇒ Driver
    • .scheduleVoices() ⇒ this
    • .scheduleMeasures(voiceIndex)
    • .scheduleNotes(measureIndex, voiceIndex)
    • .toggle([startTime])
    • .start(startTime) ⇒ this
    • .stop() ⇒ this
    • .clear() ⇒ this

# driver.bpm

Set the bpm value of the transport.

Kind: instance property of Driver

Param Type
value number

# driver.bpm ⇒ number

Get the bpm value of the transport.

Kind: instance property of Driver

# driver.loopStart

Sets the point in time to start the loop of the transport.

Kind: instance property of Driver

Param
time

# driver.state ⇒ String

Returns the current state of the transport, either 'stopped', 'started' or 'paused'.

Kind: instance property of Driver

# driver.position ⇒ Ticks

Returns the position in the transport that is currently being played.

Kind: instance property of Driver

# driver.setScore(score, [updateTransport]) ⇒ this

Set the score the driver will play.

Kind: instance method of Driver

Param Type Default Description
score Score A score containing voices.
[updateTransport] boolean true Whether to update the transport's time signature and bpm values based on the score.

# driver.setInstruments(Instruments) ⇒ this

Set the instruments the driver will play with.

Kind: instance method of Driver

Param Type Description
Instruments Array An array of instrument instances which will be used to play the voices.

# driver.addInstrument(instrument)

Adds an instrument to the score.

Kind: instance method of Driver

Param
instrument

# driver.startMetronome() ⇒ this

Schedule metronome and start it.

Kind: instance method of Driver

# driver.stopMetronome() ⇒ this

Stops the metronome and removes it from the transport.

Kind: instance method of Driver

# driver.toggleMetronome() ⇒ Driver

Starts the metronome if it's stopped, otherwise stops it.

Kind: instance method of Driver

# driver.scheduleVoices() ⇒ this

Schedules all the voices of the score to the transport.

Kind: instance method of Driver

# driver.scheduleMeasures(voiceIndex)

Schedules all the measures of a voice from the score to the transport.

Kind: instance method of Driver

Param Type Description
voiceIndex number Index of the voice in the score to schedule.

# driver.scheduleNotes(measureIndex, voiceIndex)

Schedules the notes of a measure to the transport.

Kind: instance method of Driver

Param Type
measureIndex number
voiceIndex number

# driver.toggle([startTime])

Toggles the state of the transport.

Kind: instance method of Driver

Param Type Default Description
[startTime] number 0 Time to start the score.

# driver.start(startTime) ⇒ this

Start the transport.

Kind: instance method of Driver

Param Default
startTime 0

# driver.stop() ⇒ this

Stops the transport.

Kind: instance method of Driver

# driver.clear() ⇒ this

Clear the transport from everything that was scheduled.

Kind: instance method of Driver
